sentences.english: "We herded sheep on Brokeback one summer, " said Ennis.
sentences.chinese: “有一年夏天，我們在斷背山上放羊”安尼斯說。

sentences.english: Forget “Brokeback Mountain”, with its distracting scenery.
sentences.chinese: 忘掉《斷背山》以及電影中美得讓人分心的景色吧。

sentences.english: On "Brokeback Mountain, " I felt you with me every day.
sentences.chinese: 在拍《斷背山》時，我覺得每天你們都和我在一起。

sentences.english: Qingdao City in the eastern part of a new downtown business district, overlooking beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 青島市東部新區的繁華商貿區，背山面海風光秀麗。

sentences.english: Broke Back Mountain created a lot of controversy when in came out in theaters throughout the United States.
sentences.chinese: 斷背山上映後在整個美國引起衆多爭議。
